Profile Image: an illustration of an old man with a long white beard, wearing a blue robe covered in images of yellow stars and crescent moons and wearing a tall, green, pointy hat with the image of a star. The image has been altered so that it's my face. Illustration from The Mysterious Stranger (1922) by Mark Twain.
